CustomField.description: Picklist to specify Flow Type as based on IATI code list (http://reference.iatistandard.org/203/codelists/FlowType/). The code list sits in the API Name/value of the picklist value, while the Label is the human-readable name of the Flow Type. This code is printed into the transaction/flow-type/@code attribute in the IATI Activity XML.
CustomField.label: IATI Flow Type
